    • put

      public static Object put​(String url, Object obj, Class<?> responseObjClass)
      Constructs a PUT request to the given url, passing the specified object as body. It expects in the response body an object of the passed class
      Parameters:
      url - the url of the endpoint
      obj - the object to send
      responseObjClass - the class of the object expected inside the response
      Returns:
      the object extracted from the response body
